content: The whole island was a wasteland of ice, whipped by freezing storms, and bleached skeletons were the only signs of the life that had once been there.
translations: ita:L'intera isola era un deserto di ghiaccio, frustata da tempeste gelide, e scheletri sbiancati erano gli unici segni dell
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
